mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD2 ORDER BY SEQ DESC

SELECT b.SEQ seq ,b.TITLE title, b.WRITER writer, b.CONTENT content, b.REGDATE regdate, b.CNT cnt, bf.fileid fileid, bf.filename filename, bf.origfilename originfilename, bf.filepath filepath FROM BOARD2 b LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_FILE bf ON b.FILEID = bf.FILEID WHERE b.seq =#{seq}
